general.Short Summary: Create a concise 3-sentence summary of this webpage highlighting the main topic, key points, and intended audience.
general.Detailed Summary: Provide a comprehensive summary of this webpage including: main topic, key sections, important facts, central argument, target audience, and takeaway message. Include any significant data points or statistics mentioned.

youtube.Short Summary: Summarize this YouTube video in 3-5 sentences covering the main topic, key points, and conclusion.
youtube.Detailed Summary: Create a detailed summary of this YouTube video including: introduction (topic and presenter), timeline of main points with timestamps when available, key insights or demonstrations, important quotes, conclusion, and who would benefit most from watching.

reddit.Short Summary: Provide a brief 3-sentence summary of this Reddit post including the main question/topic, key community responses, and overall consensus (if any).
reddit.Detailed Summary: Create a comprehensive summary of this Reddit post including: the original post's question/topic, main arguments in top comments, differing perspectives, notable expertise shared, consensus (if any), controversial points, and useful resources or links shared by the community.

pdf.Short Summary: Summarize this PDF in 5 sentences or less, covering the document type, main topic, key findings, and intended audience.
pdf.Detailed Summary: Create a detailed summary of this PDF including: document type, author(s) and organization, executive summary, methodology (if applicable), chapter/section breakdown with key points from each, important data or statistics, main conclusions, recommendations (if any), and who would benefit most from reading this document.
